code: import{Constants}from"@krogan/common";export var serverUrl=function serverUrl(){if(window.document.location.host.includes('localhost')){var host=window.document.location.host.replace(/:.*/,'');var port=Constants.WS_PORT;return"wss://".concat(host).concat(port?":".concat(port):'');}else{return"wss://server.kroganverse.com";}};export var serverApiUrl=function serverApiUrl(){if(window.document.location.host.includes('localhost')){var host=window.document.location.host.replace(/:.*/,'');var port=Constants.WS_PORT;return"https://".concat(host).concat(port?":".concat(port):'');}else{return"https://server.kroganverse.com";}};export var clientUrl=function clientUrl(){return"".concat(location.protocol==='https:'?'https://':'http://').concat(window.document.location.host);};
